body:
Hi,



I can't seem to run the hour analysis component nor the shadowstudy and I don't understand why, as I am following step-by-step by a written code.



If someone could take a look at it, it will be of great help, thanks!



Adi
topic: sunlight hour analysis component giving en error

replies.body:
Adi,

Attached a working version. There were missing geometries (not internalised) and i'm afraid you messed the sunlightHours component. I replaced it.

Don't recommend usin the LB_shadowStudy since it is not stable and fully working. Just a WIP.

-A.
